page.title: 15EDUCATION
page.content: A RESIDENTIAL EXPERIENCE AT A CENTRE PROVIDING A VARIETY OF OUTDOOR ACTIVITIES HAS BECOME AN IMPORTANT PART OF THE EDUCATION OF MANY YOUNG PEOPLE. MAES Y LADE, UNTIL EIGHTEEN YEARS AGO, WAS A HILL FARM. APPROXIMATELY THREE HUNDRED METRES ABOVE SEA LEVEL IT GIVES EASY ACCESS TO THE BLACK MOUNTAINS. IT IS LEASED BY THE EDUCATION DEPARTMENT OF ESSEX COUNTY COUNCIL FOR USE BY STUDENTS FOURTEEN YEARS OF AGE AND OVER. AS WELL AS TAKING PART IN RIDING, CANOEING, CAVING, HILL WALKING, ORIENTEERING AND CAMPING, STUDENTS ATTENDING THE CENTRE HAVE TO BE RESPONSIBLE FOR ALL DOMESTIC TASKS DURING THEIR STAY. THE CENTRE OPERATES THROUGHOUT THE YEAR, PARTIES VARYING FROM TWENTY TO THIRTY IN NUMBER. GROUPS TRAVEL TO AND FROM ESSEX BY COACH.THEY WALK THE FINAL MILE.
